What started out as a weekend of rest and relaxation ended up being 48 hours of uninhibited, wild, unbridled RAW sex as these guys turned the retreat into a Raw Retreat! And can you blame them ten of the hottest men, all together in a mountain cabin and each horny as hell well, it was bound to happen. Hot, hard cocks and tight, juicy, pink, pucker holes just waiting to fuck and be fucked. The action is wild and unrestrained as the 10 days guys go after each other non-stop for the entire weekend.
title: Raw Retreat
